title: Quebec Tranquil Wilderness Ski Retreat with Indoor Pool, Spa & Sauna
description:
Nestled between Quebec's majestic mountains and the mighty Saint Lawrence River, Club Med Québec-Charlevoix is your all-season Canadian escape. Winter brings world-class skiing and snowboarding right to your doorstep, while year-round you're surrounded by UNESCO Biosphere Reserve beauty that will blow you away.

After conquering the slopes or exploring riverside trails, dive into the heated indoor pool or melt away muscle tension in the luxurious spa and sauna. This accommodation is your base camp for adventure with Club Med's unmistakable spirit, where mountain magic meets riverfront bliss.
offer_address: 1 Rue de la Montagne-Secrète, Petite-Rivière-Saint-François, Québec G0A 2L0, Canada
